Cards.name: Kaido
Cards.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −7 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Trash up to 1 of your opponent's Life cards.

Cards.name: Ulti
Cards.effect: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Play up to 1 [Page One] card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.

Cards.name: Kaido
Cards.effect: [On Play] DON!! −5 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less. This Character gains [Rush] during this turn.<br

Cards.name: King
Cards.effect: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

Cards.name: Queen
Cards.effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)<br

Cards.name: Sasaki
Cards.effect: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Draw 1 card.

Cards.name: Jack
Cards.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

Cards.name: Who's.Who
Cards.effect: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

Cards.name: Black Maria
Cards.effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

Cards.name: Lead Performer "Disaster"
Cards.effect: [Main] Draw 1 card, then add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

Cards.name: Brachio Bomber
Cards.effect: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less, then add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

Cards.name: Blast Breath
Cards.effect: [Counter] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.

Cards.name: Onigashima Island
Cards.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Stage: If your Leader has the {Animal Kingdom Pirates} type, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
